title: Uttarimanussadhamma
content_plain: theravāda vinaya mahāvibhaṅga pārājikakaṇḍa 4 catutthapārājikasikkhāpada tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ tena kho pana samayena sambahulā sandiṭṭhā sambhattā bhikkhū vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu tena kho pana samayena vajjī dubbhikkhā hoti dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi etarahi kho vajjī dubbhikkhā dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ kena nu kho mayaṁ upāyena samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vaseyyāma na ca piṇḍakena kilameyyāmā ti ekacce evamāhaṁsu handa mayaṁ āvuso gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhema evaṁ te amhākaṁ dātuṁ maññissanti evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā ti ekacce evamāhaṁsu alaṁ āvuso kiṁ gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhitena handa mayaṁ āvuso gihīnaṁ dūteyyaṁ harāma evaṁ te amhākaṁ dātuṁ maññissanti evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā ti ekacce evamāhaṁsu alaṁ āvuso kiṁ gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhitena kiṁ gihīnaṁ dūteyyaṁ haṭena handa mayaṁ āvuso gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissāma asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī asuko bhikkhu dutiyassa jhānassa lābhī asuko bhikkhu tatiyassa jhānassa lābhī asuko bhikkhu catutthassa jhānassa lābhī asuko bhikkhu sotāpanno asuko bhikkhu sakadāgāmī asuko bhikkhu anāgāmī asuko bhikkhu arahā asuko bhikkhu tevijjo asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño ti evaṁ te amhākaṁ dātuṁ maññissanti evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā ti esoyeva kho āvuso seyyo yo amhākaṁ gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇo bhāsito ti atha kho te bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī pe asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño ti atha kho te manussā lābhā vata no suladdhaṁ vata no yesaṁ no evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṁ upagatā na vata no ito pubbe evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṁ upagatā yathayime bhikkhū sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā ti te na tādisāni bhojanāni attanā paribhuñjanti mātāpitūnaṁ denti puttadārassa denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṁ denti ñātisālohitānaṁ denti yādisāni bhikkhūnaṁ denti te na tādisāni khādanīyāni sāyanīyāni pānāni attanā khādanti sāyanti pivanti mātāpitūnaṁ denti puttadārassa denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṁ denti ñātisālohitānaṁ denti yādisāni bhikkhūnaṁ denti atha kho te bhikkhū vaṇṇavā ahesuṁ pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ vassaṁvuṭṭhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṁvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaraṁ ādāya yena vesālī tena pakkamiṁsu anupubbena yena vesālī mahāvanaṁ kūṭāgārasālā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu tena kho pana samayena disāsu vassaṁvuṭṭhā bhikkhū kisā honti lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodituṁ atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca kacci bhikkhave khamanīyaṁ kacci yāpanīyaṁ kacci samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasittha na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā ti khamanīyaṁ bhagavā yāpanīyaṁ bhagavā samaggā ca mayaṁ bhante sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasimhā na ca piṇḍakena kilamimhā ti jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti jānantāpi na pucchanti pe dvīhākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū paṭipucchanti dhammaṁ vā desessāma sāvakānaṁ vā sikkhāpadaṁ paññapessāmā ti atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca yathā kathaṁ pana tumhe bhikkhave samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasittha na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā ti atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ kacci pana vo bhikkhave bhūtan ti abhūtaṁ bhagavā ti vigarahi buddho bhagavā ananucchavikaṁ moghapurisā ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ kathañhi nāma tumhe moghapurisā udarassa kāraṇā gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissatha varaṁ tumhehi moghapurisā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchi parikanto na tveva udarassa kāraṇā gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇo bhāsito taṁ kissa hetu tatonidānañhi moghapurisā maraṇaṁ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ na tveva tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjeyya itonidānañca kho moghapurisā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjeyya netaṁ moghapurisā appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya pe vigarahitvā dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi pañcime bhikkhave mahācorā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ katame pañca idha bhikkhave ekaccassa mahācorassa evaṁ hoti kudāssu nāmāhaṁ satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu āhiṇḍissāmi hananto ghātento chindanto chedāpento pacanto pācento ti so aparena samayena satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu āhiṇḍati hananto ghātento chindanto chedāpento pacanto pācento evameva kho bhikkhave idhekaccassa pāpabhikkhuno evaṁ hoti kudāssu nāmāhaṁ satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu cārikaṁ carissāmi sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito gahaṭṭhānañceva pabbajitānañca lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānan ti so aparena samayena satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu cārikaṁ carati sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito gahaṭṭhānañceva pabbajitānañca lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ ayaṁ bhikkhave paṭhamo mahācoro santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ puna caparaṁ bhikkhave idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahati ayaṁ bhikkhave dutiyo mahācoro santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ puna caparaṁ bhikkhave idhekacco pāpabhikkhu suddhaṁ brahmacāriṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carantaṁ amūlakena abrahmacariyena anuddhaṁseti ayaṁ bhikkhave tatiyo mahācoro santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ puna caparaṁ bhikkhave idhekacco pāpabhikkhu yāni tāni saṅghassa garubhaṇḍāni garuparikkhārāni seyyathidaṁ ārāmo ārāmavatthu vihāro vihāravatthu mañco pīṭhaṁ bhisi bibbohanaṁ lohakumbhī lohabhāṇakaṁ lohavārako lohakaṭāhaṁ vāsi parasu kuṭhārī kudālo nikhādanaṁ valli veḷu muñjaṁ pabbajaṁ tiṇaṁ mattikā dārubhaṇḍaṁ mattikābhaṇḍaṁ tehi gihiṁ saṅgaṇhāti upalāpeti ayaṁ bhikkhave catuttho mahācoro santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ sadevake bhikkhave loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ayaṁ aggo mahācoro yo asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati taṁ kissa hetu theyyāya vo bhikkhave raṭṭhapiṇḍo bhutto ti aññathā santamattānaṁ aññathā yo pavedaye nikacca kitavasseva bhuttaṁ theyyena tassa taṁ kāsāvakaṇṭhā bahavo pāpadhammā asaññatā pāpā pāpehi kammehi nirayaṁ te upapajjare seyyo ayoguḷo bhutto tatto aggisikhūpamo yañce bhuñjeyya dussīlo raṭṭhapiṇḍaṁ asaññatoti atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya dupposatāya pe evañca pana bhikkhave imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha yo pana bhikkhu anabhijānaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ attupanāyikaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanaṁ samudācareyya iti jānāmi iti passāmī ti tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṁ vadeyya ajānamevaṁ āvuso avacaṁ jānāmi apassaṁ passāmi tucchaṁ musā vilapin ti ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso ti evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū adiṭṭhe diṭṭhasaññino apatte pattasaññino anadhigate adhigatasaññino asacchikate sacchikatasaññino adhimānena aññaṁ byākariṁsu tesaṁ aparena samayena rāgāyapi cittaṁ namati dosāyapi cittaṁ namati mohāyapi cittaṁ namati tesaṁ kukkuccaṁ ahosi bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ mayañcamha adiṭṭhe diṭṭhasaññino apatte pattasaññino anadhigate adhigatasaññino asacchikate sacchikatasaññino adhimānena aññaṁ byākarimhā kacci nu kho mayaṁ pārājikaṁ āpattiṁ āpannā ti te āyasmato ānandassa etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi honti ye te ānanda bhikkhū adiṭṭhe diṭṭhasaññino apatte pattasaññino anadhigate adhigatasaññino asacchikate sacchikatasaññino adhimānena aññaṁ byākaronti tañca kho etaṁ abbohārikan ti evañca pana bhikkhave imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha yo pana bhikkhu anabhijānaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ attupanāyikaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanaṁ samudācareyya iti jānāmi iti passāmī ti tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṁ vadeyya ajānamevaṁ āvuso avacaṁ jānāmi apassaṁ passāmi tucchaṁ musā vilapin ti aññatra adhimānā ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso ti yo panāti yo yādiso pe bhikkhūti pe ayaṁ imasmiṁ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti anabhijānanti asantaṁ abhūtaṁ asaṁvijjamānaṁ ajānanto apassanto attani kusalaṁ dhammaṁ atthi me kusalo dhammoti uttarimanussadhammo nāma jhānaṁ vimokkho samādhi samāpatti ñāṇadassanaṁ maggabhāvanā phalasacchikiriyā kilesappahānaṁ vinīvaraṇatā cittassa suññāgāre abhirati attupanāyikanti te vā kusale dhamme attani upaneti attānaṁ vā tesu kusalesu dhammesu upaneti ñāṇanti tisso vijjā dassananti yaṁ ñāṇaṁ taṁ dassanaṁ yaṁ dassanaṁ taṁ ñāṇaṁ samudācareyyāti āroceyya itthiyā vā purisassa vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā iti jānāmi iti passāmīti jānāmahaṁ ete dhamme passāmahaṁ ete dhamme atthi ca ete dhammā mayi ahañca etesu dhammesu sandissāmīti tato aparena samayenāti yasmiṁ khaṇe samudāciṇṇaṁ hoti taṁ khaṇaṁ taṁ layaṁ taṁ muhuttaṁ vītivatte samanuggāhīyamānoti yaṁ vatthu paṭiññātaṁ hoti tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ samanuggāhīyamāno kinte adhigataṁ kinti te adhigataṁ kadā te adhigataṁ kattha te adhigataṁ katame te kilesā pahīnā katamesaṁ tvaṁ dhammānaṁ lābhī ti asamanuggāhīyamānoti na kenaci vuccamāno āpannoti pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapitvā pārājikaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno hoti visuddhāpekkhoti gihī vā hotukāmo upāsako vā hotukāmo ārāmiko vā hotukāmo sāmaṇero vā hotukāmo ajānamevaṁ āvuso avacaṁ jānāmi apassaṁ passāmīti nāhaṁ ete dhamme jānāmi nāhaṁ ete dhamme passāmi natthi ca ete dhammā mayi na cāhaṁ etesu dhammesu sandissāmīti tucchaṁ musā vilapinti tucchakaṁ mayā bhaṇitaṁ musā mayā bhaṇitaṁ abhūtaṁ mayā bhaṇitaṁ ajānantena mayā bhaṇitaṁ aññatra adhimānāti ṭhapetvā adhimānaṁ ayampīti purime upādāya vuccati pārājiko hotīti seyyathāpi nāma tālo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna virūḷhiyā evameva bhikkhu pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapitvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo tena vuccati pārājiko hotī ti asaṁvāsoti saṁvāso nāma ekakammaṁ ekuddeso samasikkhatā eso saṁvāso nāma so tena saddhiṁ natthi tena vuccati asaṁvāso ti uttarimanussadhammo nāma jhānaṁ vimokkho samādhi samāpatti ñāṇadassanaṁ maggabhāvanā phalasacchikiriyā kilesappahānaṁ vinīvaraṇatā cittassa suññāgāre abhirati jhānanti paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ vimokkhoti suññato vimokkho animitto vimokkho appaṇihito vimokkho samādhīti suññato samādhi animitto samādhi appaṇihito samādhi samāpattīti suññatā samāpatti animittā samāpatti appaṇihitā samāpatti ñāṇadassananti tisso vijjā maggabhāvanāti cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo phalasacchikiriyāti sotāpattiphalassa sacchikiriyā sakadāgāmiphalassa sacchikiriyā anāgāmiphalassa sacchikiriyā arahattassa sacchikiriyā kilesappahānanti rāgassa pahānaṁ dosassa pahānaṁ mohassa pahānaṁ vinīvaraṇatā cittassāti rāgā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā dosā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā mohā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā suññāgāre abhiratīti paṭhamena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati dutiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati tatiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati catutthena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati tīhākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti catūhākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti mayhaṁ āvuso etadahosi acchariyaṁ vata bho abbhutaṁ vata bho evarūpopi nāma satto bhavissati evarūpopi nāma yakkho bhavissati evarūpopi nāma attabhāvappaṭilābho bhavissatī ti bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti uttarimanussadhammaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno ullapatī ti atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṁ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṁ vā karissati pubbeva me sā bhikkhave sāmaṇerī diṭṭhā ahosi api cāhaṁ na byākāsiṁ ahañcetaṁ byākareyyaṁ pare ca me na saddaheyyuṁ ye me na saddaheyyuṁ tesaṁ taṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya esā bhikkhave sāmaṇerī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇerī ahosi sā tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena evarūpaṁ attabhāvappaṭilābhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti saccaṁ bhikkhave moggallāno āha anāpatti bhikkhave moggallānassā ti atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi yatāyaṁ āvuso tapodā sandati so daho acchodako sītodako sātodako setako suppatittho ramaṇīyo pahūtamacchakacchapo cakkamattāni ca padumāni pupphantī ti bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti kathañhi nāma āyasmā mahāmoggallāno evaṁ vakkhati yatāyaṁ āvuso tapodā sandati so daho acchodako sītodako sātodako setako suppatittho ramaṇīyo pahūtamacchakacchapo cakkamattāni ca padumāni pupphantī ti atha ca panāyaṁ tapodā kuthitā sandati uttarimanussadhammaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno ullapatī ti bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ yatāyaṁ bhikkhave tapodā sandati so daho acchodako sītodako sātodako setako suppatittho ramaṇīyo pahūtamacchakacchapo cakkamattāni ca padumāni pupphanti api cāyaṁ bhikkhave tapodā dvinnaṁ mahānirayānaṁ antarikāya āgacchati tenāyaṁ tapodā kuthitā sandati saccaṁ bhikkhave moggallāno āha anāpatti bhikkhave moggallānassā ti tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro licchavīhi saddhiṁ saṅgāmento pabhaggo ahosi atha rājā pacchā senaṁ saṅkaḍḍhitvā licchavayo parājesi saṅgāme ca nandī carati raññā licchavī pabhaggā ti atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi rājā āvuso licchavīhi pabhaggo ti bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti kathañhi nāma āyasmā mahāmoggallāno evaṁ vakkhati rājā āvuso licchavīhi pabhaggo ti saṅgāme ca nandī carati raññā licchavī pabhaggā ti uttarimanussadhammaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno ullapatī ti bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ paṭhamaṁ bhikkhave rājā licchavīhi pabhaggo atha rājā pacchā senaṁ saṅkaḍḍhitvā licchavayo parājesi saccaṁ bhikkhave moggallāno āha anāpatti bhikkhave moggallānassā ti atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi idhāhaṁ āvuso sappinikāya nadiyā tīre āneñjaṁ samādhiṁ samāpanno nāgānaṁ ogayha uttarantānaṁ koñcaṁ karontānaṁ saddaṁ assosin ti bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti kathañhi nāma āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āneñjaṁ samādhiṁ samāpanno saddaṁ sossati uttarimanussadhammaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno ullapatī ti bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ attheso bhikkhave samādhi so ca kho aparisuddho saccaṁ bhikkhave moggallāno āha anāpatti bhikkhave moggallānassā ti atha kho āyasmā sobhito bhikkhū āmantesi ahaṁ āvuso pañca kappasatāni anussarāmī ti bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti kathañhi nāma āyasmā sobhito evaṁ vakkhati ahaṁ āvuso pañca kappasatāni anussarāmī ti uttarimanussadhammaṁ āyasmā sobhito ullapatī ti bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ atthesā bhikkhave sobhitassa sā ca kho ekāyeva jāti saccaṁ bhikkhave sobhito āha anāpatti bhikkhave sobhitassā ti catutthapārājikaṁ samattaṁ uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā yesaṁ bhikkhu aññataraṁ vā aññataraṁ vā āpajjitvā na labhati bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ saṁvāsaṁ yathā pure tathā pacchā pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso tatthāyasmante pucchāmi kaccittha parisuddhā dutiyampi pucchāmi kaccittha parisuddhā tatiyampi pucchāmi kaccittha parisuddhā parisuddhetthāyasmanto tasmā tuṇhī evametaṁ dhārayāmīti pārājikaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ tassuddānaṁ methunādinnādānañca manussaviggahuttari pārājikāni cattāri chejjavatthū asaṁsayāti pārājikakaṇḍaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ
content_json:
{
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:0.1": "Theravāda Vinaya ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:0.2": "Mahāvibhaṅga ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:0.3": "Pārājikakaṇḍa ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:0.4": "4. Catutthapārājikasikkhāpada ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.1": "Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.2": "Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā sandiṭṭhā sambhattā bhikkhū vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.3": "Tena kho pana samayena vajjī dubbhikkhā hoti dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.4": "na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.5": "Atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—“etarahi kho vajjī dubbhikkhā dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā, na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.6": "Kena nu kho mayaṁ upāyena samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vaseyyāma, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.7": "na ca piṇḍakena kilameyyāmā”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.8": "Ekacce evamāhaṁsu—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.9": "“handa mayaṁ, āvuso, gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhema, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.10": "evaṁ te amhākaṁ dātuṁ maññissanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.11": "Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.12": "na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.13": "Ekacce evamāhaṁsu—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.14": "“alaṁ, āvuso, kiṁ gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhitena. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.15": "Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, gihīnaṁ dūteyyaṁ harāma, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.16": "evaṁ te amhākaṁ dātuṁ maññissanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.17": "Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.18": "na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.19": "Ekacce evamāhaṁsu—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.20": "“alaṁ, āvuso, kiṁ gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhitena. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.21": "Kiṁ gihīnaṁ dūteyyaṁ haṭena. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.22": "Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissāma—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.23": "‘asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.24": "asuko bhikkhu dutiyassa jhānassa lābhī, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.25": "asuko bhikkhu tatiyassa jhānassa lābhī, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.26": "asuko bhikkhu catutthassa jhānassa lābhī, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.27": "asuko bhikkhu sotāpanno, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.28": "asuko bhikkhu sakadāgāmī, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.29": "asuko bhikkhu anāgāmī, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.30": "asuko bhikkhu arahā, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.31": "asuko bhikkhu tevijjo, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.32": "asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño’ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.33": "Evaṁ te amhākaṁ dātuṁ maññissanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.34": "Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.35": "na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.36": "“Esoyeva kho, āvuso, seyyo yo amhākaṁ gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇo bhāsito”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.37": "Atha kho te bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.38": "“asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.39": "asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.40": "Atha kho te manussā—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.41": "“lābhā vata no, suladdhaṁ vata no, yesaṁ no evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṁ upagatā; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.42": "na vata no ito pubbe evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṁ upagatā yathayime bhikkhū sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.43": "te na tādisāni bhojanāni attanā paribhuñjanti mātāpitūnaṁ denti puttadārassa denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṁ denti ñātisālohitānaṁ denti, yādisāni bhikkhūnaṁ denti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.44": "Te na tādisāni khādanīyāni sāyanīyāni pānāni attanā khādanti sāyanti pivanti mātāpitūnaṁ denti puttadārassa denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṁ denti ñātisālohitānaṁ denti, yādisāni bhikkhūnaṁ denti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.1.45": "Atha kho te bhikkhū vaṇṇavā ahesuṁ pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.1": "Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ vassaṁvuṭṭhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.2": "Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṁvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaraṁ ādāya yena vesālī tena pakkamiṁsu. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.3": "Anupubbena yena vesālī mahāvanaṁ kūṭāgārasālā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.4": "Tena kho pana samayena disāsu vassaṁvuṭṭhā bhikkhū kisā honti lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.5": "vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.6": "Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodituṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.7": "Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.8": "“kacci, bhikkhave, khamanīyaṁ kacci yāpanīyaṁ ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.9": "kacci samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasittha, na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.10": "“Khamanīyaṁ, bhagavā, yāpanīyaṁ, bhagavā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.11": "Samaggā ca mayaṁ, bhante, sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasimhā, na ca piṇḍakena kilamimhā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.12": "Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi na pucchanti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.13": "dvīhākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū paṭipucchanti— “dhammaṁ vā desessāma, sāvakānaṁ vā sikkhāpadaṁ paññapessāmā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.14": "Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.15": "“yathā kathaṁ pana tumhe, bhikkhave, samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasittha na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.16": "Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.17": "“Kacci pana vo, bhikkhave, bhūtan”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.18": "“Abhūtaṁ, bhagavā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.19": "Vigarahi buddho bhagavā—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.20": "“ananucchavikaṁ, moghapurisā, ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.21": "Kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, udarassa kāraṇā gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissatha. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.22": "Varaṁ tumhehi, moghapurisā, tiṇhena govikantanena kucchi parikanto, na tveva udarassa kāraṇā gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇo bhāsito. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.23": "Taṁ kissa hetu? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.24": "Tatonidānañhi, moghapurisā, maraṇaṁ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.25": "na tveva tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjeyya. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.26": "Itonidānañca kho, moghapurisā, kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjeyya. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.27": "Netaṁ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.2.28": "vigarahitvā dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.1": "“Pañcime, bhikkhave, mahācorā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.2": "Katame pañca? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.3": "Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa mahācorassa evaṁ hoti—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.4": "‘kudāssu nāmāhaṁ satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu āhiṇḍissāmi ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.5": "hananto ghātento chindanto chedāpento pacanto pācento’ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.6": "So aparena samayena satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu āhiṇḍati hananto ghātento chindanto chedāpento pacanto pācento. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.7": "Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekaccassa pāpabhikkhuno evaṁ hoti—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.8": "‘kudāssu nāmāhaṁ satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu cārikaṁ carissāmi ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.9": "sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito gahaṭṭhānañceva pabbajitānañca, lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānan’ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.10": "So aparena samayena satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu cārikaṁ carati sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito gahaṭṭhānañceva pabbajitānañca, lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.11": "Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo mahācoro santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.12": "Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.13": "Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo mahācoro santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.14": "Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco pāpabhikkhu suddhaṁ brahmacāriṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carantaṁ amūlakena abrahmacariyena anuddhaṁseti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.15": "Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo mahācoro santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.16": "Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco pāpabhikkhu yāni tāni saṅghassa garubhaṇḍāni garuparikkhārāni, seyyathidaṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.17": "ārāmo ārāmavatthu vihāro vihāravatthu mañco pīṭhaṁ bhisi bibbohanaṁ lohakumbhī lohabhāṇakaṁ lohavārako lohakaṭāhaṁ vāsi parasu kuṭhārī kudālo nikhādanaṁ valli veḷu muñjaṁ pabbajaṁ tiṇaṁ mattikā dārubhaṇḍaṁ mattikābhaṇḍaṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.18": "tehi gihiṁ saṅgaṇhāti upalāpeti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.19": "Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho mahācoro santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.20": "Sadevake, bhikkhave, loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ayaṁ aggo mahācoro yo asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.21": "Taṁ kissa hetu? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.22": "Theyyāya vo, bhikkhave, raṭṭhapiṇḍo bhutto”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.23": "Aññathā santamattānaṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.24": "aññathā yo pavedaye; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.25": "Nikacca kitavasseva, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.26": "bhuttaṁ theyyena tassa taṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.27": "Kāsāvakaṇṭhā bahavo, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.28": "pāpadhammā asaññatā; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.29": "Pāpā pāpehi kammehi, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.30": "nirayaṁ te upapajjare. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.31": "Seyyo ayoguḷo bhutto, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.32": "tatto aggisikhūpamo; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.33": "Yañce bhuñjeyya dussīlo, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.34": "raṭṭhapiṇḍaṁ asaññatoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.35": "Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya dupposatāya …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.36": "evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.37.1": "“Yo pana bhikkhu anabhijānaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ attupanāyikaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanaṁ samudācareyya—‘iti jānāmi iti passāmī’ti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.38": "tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṁ vadeyya—‘ajānamevaṁ, āvuso, avacaṁ jānāmi, apassaṁ passāmi. Tucchaṁ musā vilapin’ti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.39": "ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:1.3.40": "Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.1": "Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū adiṭṭhe diṭṭhasaññino apatte pattasaññino anadhigate adhigatasaññino asacchikate sacchikatasaññino adhimānena aññaṁ byākariṁsu. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.2": "Tesaṁ aparena samayena rāgāyapi cittaṁ namati dosāyapi cittaṁ namati mohāyapi cittaṁ namati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.3": "Tesaṁ kukkuccaṁ ahosi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.4": "“bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.5": "Mayañcamha adiṭṭhe diṭṭhasaññino apatte pattasaññino anadhigate adhigatasaññino asacchikate sacchikatasaññino, adhimānena aññaṁ byākarimhā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.6": "Kacci nu kho mayaṁ pārājikaṁ āpattiṁ āpannā”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.7": "Te āyasmato ānandassa etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.8": "Āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.9": "“Honti ye te, ānanda, bhikkhū adiṭṭhe diṭṭhasaññino apatte pattasaññino anadhigate adhigatasaññino asacchikate sacchikatasaññino adhimānena aññaṁ byākaronti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.10": "Tañca kho etaṁ abbohārikan”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.11": "“Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.12.1": "“Yo pana bhikkhu anabhijānaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ attupanāyikaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanaṁ samudācareyya—‘iti jānāmi iti passāmī’ti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.13": "tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṁ vadeyya—‘ajānamevaṁ, āvuso, avacaṁ jānāmi, apassaṁ passāmi. Tucchaṁ musā vilapin’ti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.14": "aññatra adhimānā, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:2.15": "ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.1": "Yo panāti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.2": "yo yādiso …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.3": "bhikkhūti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.4": "…pe… ayaṁ imasmiṁ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.5": "Anabhijānanti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.6": "asantaṁ abhūtaṁ asaṁvijjamānaṁ ajānanto apassanto attani kusalaṁ dhammaṁ— atthi me kusalo dhammoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.7": "Uttarimanussadhammo nāma ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.8": "jhānaṁ vimokkho samādhi samāpatti ñāṇadassanaṁ maggabhāvanā phalasacchikiriyā kilesappahānaṁ vinīvaraṇatā cittassa suññāgāre abhirati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.9": "Attupanāyikanti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.10": "te vā kusale dhamme attani upaneti attānaṁ vā tesu kusalesu dhammesu upaneti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.11": "Ñāṇanti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.12": "tisso vijjā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.13": "Dassananti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.14": "yaṁ ñāṇaṁ taṁ dassanaṁ, yaṁ dassanaṁ taṁ ñāṇaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.15": "Samudācareyyāti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.16": "āroceyya itthiyā vā purisassa vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.17": "Iti jānāmi iti passāmīti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.18": "jānāmahaṁ ete dhamme, passāmahaṁ ete dhamme atthi ca ete dhammā mayi, ahañca etesu dhammesu sandissāmīti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.19": "Tato aparena samayenāti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.20": "yasmiṁ khaṇe samudāciṇṇaṁ hoti taṁ khaṇaṁ taṁ layaṁ taṁ muhuttaṁ vītivatte. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.21": "Samanuggāhīyamānoti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.22": "yaṁ vatthu paṭiññātaṁ hoti tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ samanuggāhīyamāno—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.23": "“kinte adhigataṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.24": "kinti te adhigataṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.25": "kadā te adhigataṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.26": "kattha te adhigataṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.27": "katame te kilesā pahīnā, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.28": "katamesaṁ tvaṁ dhammānaṁ lābhī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.29": "Asamanuggāhīyamānoti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.30": "na kenaci vuccamāno. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.31": "Āpannoti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.32": "pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapitvā pārājikaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno hoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.33": "Visuddhāpekkhoti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.34": "gihī vā hotukāmo upāsako vā hotukāmo ārāmiko vā hotukāmo sāmaṇero vā hotukāmo. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.35": "Ajānamevaṁ, āvuso, avacaṁ—jānāmi, apassaṁ passāmīti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.36": "nāhaṁ ete dhamme jānāmi, nāhaṁ ete dhamme passāmi, natthi ca ete dhammā mayi, na cāhaṁ etesu dhammesu sandissāmīti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.37": "Tucchaṁ musā vilapinti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.38": "tucchakaṁ mayā bhaṇitaṁ, musā mayā bhaṇitaṁ, abhūtaṁ mayā bhaṇitaṁ, ajānantena mayā bhaṇitaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.39": "Aññatra adhimānāti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.40": "ṭhapetvā adhimānaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.41": "Ayampīti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.42": "purime upādāya vuccati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.43": "Pārājiko hotīti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.44": "seyyathāpi nāma tālo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna virūḷhiyā; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.45": "evameva bhikkhu pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapitvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.46": "Tena vuccati— “pārājiko hotī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.47": "Asaṁvāsoti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.48": "saṁvāso nāma ekakammaṁ ekuddeso samasikkhatā— eso saṁvāso nāma. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:3.49": "So tena saddhiṁ natthi. Tena vuccati— “asaṁvāso”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.1": "Uttarimanussadhammo nāma ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.2": "jhānaṁ vimokkho samādhi samāpatti ñāṇadassanaṁ maggabhāvanā phalasacchikiriyā kilesappahānaṁ vinīvaraṇatā cittassa suññāgāre abhirati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.3.1": "Jhānanti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.4": "paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.5": "Vimokkhoti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.6": "suññato vimokkho animitto vimokkho appaṇihito vimokkho. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.7": "Samādhīti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.8": "suññato samādhi animitto samādhi appaṇihito samādhi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.9": "Samāpattīti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.10": "suññatā samāpatti animittā samāpatti appaṇihitā samāpatti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.11": "Ñāṇadassananti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.12": "tisso vijjā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.13": "Maggabhāvanāti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.14": "cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.15": "Phalasacchikiriyāti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.16": "sotāpattiphalassa sacchikiriyā, sakadāgāmiphalassa sacchikiriyā, anāgāmiphalassa sacchikiriyā, arahattassa sacchikiriyā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.17": "Kilesappahānanti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.18": "rāgassa pahānaṁ dosassa pahānaṁ mohassa pahānaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.19": "Vinīvaraṇatā cittassāti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.20": "rāgā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā, dosā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā, mohā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.21": "Suññāgāre abhiratīti ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.22": "paṭhamena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.23": "dutiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.24": "tatiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.1.25": "catutthena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.1": "Tīhākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.2": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.3": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.4": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.5": "Catūhākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.6": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.7": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.8": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.9": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.10": "Pañcahākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.11": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.12": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.13": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.14": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ vinidhāya khantiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.15": "Chahākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.16": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.17": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.18": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.19": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.20": "vinidhāya khantiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.21": "vinidhāya ruciṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.22": "Sattahākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.23": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.24": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.25": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.26": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.27": "vinidhāya khantiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.28": "vinidhāya ruciṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.2.29": "vinidhāya bhāvaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.1": "Tīhākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjāmīti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.2": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.3": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.4": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.5": "Catūhākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjāmīti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.6": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.7": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.8": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.9": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.10": "Pañcahākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjāmīti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.11": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.12": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.13": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.14": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.15": "vinidhāya khantiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.16": "Chahākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjāmīti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.17": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.18": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.3.19": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.102": "mohā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ arahattañca sacchikataṁ mayāti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.103": "Tīhākārehi mohā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ, rāgo ca me catto … ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.105": "moho ca me catto vanto mutto pahīno paṭinissaṭṭho ukkheṭito samukkheṭitoti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.106": "Tīhākārehi …pe… sattahākārehi mohā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ rāgā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.107": "dosā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.108": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.109": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.110": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.111": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.112": "vinidhāya khantiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.113": "vinidhāya ruciṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.114": "vinidhāya bhāvaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.8.115": "Ekamūlakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.1": "Yathā ekamūlakaṁ vitthāritaṁ evameva dumūlakādipi vitthāretabbaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.2.1": "Idaṁ sabbamūlakaṁ ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.3": "Tīhākārehi …pe… sattahākārehi paṭhamañca jhānaṁ dutiyañca jhānaṁ tatiyañca jhānaṁ catutthañca jhānaṁ suññatañca vimokkhaṁ animittañca vimokkhaṁ appaṇihitañca vimokkhaṁ suññatañca samādhiṁ animittañca samādhiṁ appaṇihitañca samādhiṁ suññatañca samāpattiṁ animittañca samāpattiṁ appaṇihitañca samāpattiṁ tisso ca vijjā cattāro ca satipaṭṭhāne cattāro ca sammappadhāne cattāro ca iddhipāde pañca ca indriyāni pañca ca balāni satta ca bojjhaṅge ariyañca aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ sotāpattiphalañca sakadāgāmiphalañca anāgāmiphalañca arahattañca samāpajjiṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.4": "samāpajjāmi … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.5": "samāpanno …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.6": "rāgo ca me catto, doso ca me catto, moho ca me catto vanto mutto pahīno paṭinissaṭṭho ukkheṭito samukkheṭito. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.7": "Rāgā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ, dosā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ, mohā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa āpatti pārājikassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.8": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.9": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.10": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.11": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.12": "vinidhāya khantiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.13": "vinidhāya ruciṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.14": "vinidhāya bhāvaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.15": "Sabbamūlakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:4.9.16": "Suddhikavārakathā niṭṭhitā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.1": "Tīhākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti vattukāmo dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.2": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.3": "Tīhākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti vattukāmo tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.4": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.5": "Tīhākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti vattukāmo catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.6": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.7": "Tīhākārehi …pe… sattahākārehi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti vattukāmo suññataṁ vimokkhaṁ … ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.12": "appaṇihitaṁ samādhiṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.13": "suññataṁ samāpattiṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.14": "animittaṁ samāpattiṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.15": "appaṇihitaṁ samāpattiṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.16": "tisso vijjā … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.17": "cattāro satipaṭṭhāne … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.18": "cattāro sammappadhāne … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.19": "cattāro iddhipāde … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.20": "pañcindriyāni … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.21": "pañca balāni … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.22": "satta bojjhaṅge … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.23": "ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ … ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.27": "arahattaṁ samāpajjiṁ …pe… ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.29": "doso me catto … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.30": "moho me catto vanto mutto pahīno paṭinissaṭṭho ukkheṭito samukkheṭito. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.31": "Rāgā me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.32": "dosā me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.33": "mohā me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.34": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa—",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.36": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.37": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.38": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.39": "vinidhāya khantiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.40": "vinidhāya ruciṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.41": "vinidhāya bhāvaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.1.42": "Vatthuvisārakassa ekamūlakassa khaṇḍacakkaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.2.1": "Tīhākārehi dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti vattukāmo tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.2.2": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.2.3": "Tīhākārehi dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti vattukāmo catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.2.4": "mohā me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.2.5": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.2.6": "Tīhākārehi …pe… sattahākārehi dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti vattukāmo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.2.7": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.2.8": "vinidhāya bhāvaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.2.9": "Vatthuvisārakassa ekamūlakassa baddhacakkaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.2.10": "Mūlaṁ saṅkhittaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.3.1": "Tīhākārehi mohā me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti vattukāmo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.3.2": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.3.3": "Tīhākārehi …pe… sattahākārehi mohā me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti vattukāmo dosā me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.3.4": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.3.5": "vinidhāya bhāvaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.3.6": "Vatthuvisārakassa ekamūlakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.1": "Yathā ekamūlakaṁ vitthāritaṁ evameva dumūlakādipi vitthāretabbaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.2.1": "Idaṁ sabbamūlakaṁ ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.3": "Tīhākārehi …pe… sattahākārehi paṭhamañca jhānaṁ dutiyañca jhānaṁ tatiyañca jhānaṁ catutthañca jhānaṁ suññatañca vimokkhaṁ animittañca vimokkhaṁ appaṇihitañca vimokkhaṁ suññatañca samādhiṁ animittañca samādhiṁ appaṇihitañca samādhiṁ suññatañca samāpattiṁ animittañca samāpattiṁ appaṇihitañca samāpattiṁ tisso ca vijjā cattāro ca satipaṭṭhāne cattāro ca sammappadhāne cattāro ca iddhipāde pañca ca indriyāni pañca ca balāni satta ca bojjhaṅge ariyañca aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ sotāpattiphalañca sakadāgāmiphalañca anāgāmiphalañca arahattañca samāpajjiṁ …pe… ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.5": "doso ca me catto … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.6": "moho ca me catto vanto mutto pahīno paṭinissaṭṭho ukkheṭito samukkheṭito, rāgā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ dosā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti vattukāmo mohā me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.7": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.8": "Tīhākārehi dutiyañca jhānaṁ tatiyañca jhānaṁ catutthañca jhānaṁ suññatañca vimokkhaṁ animittañca vimokkhaṁ appaṇihitañca vimokkhaṁ suññatañca samādhiṁ animittañca samādhiṁ appaṇihitañca samādhiṁ suññatañca samāpattiṁ animittañca samāpattiṁ appaṇihitañca samāpattiṁ tisso ca vijjā cattāro ca satipaṭṭhāne cattāro ca sammappadhāne cattāro ca iddhipāde pañca ca indriyāni pañca ca balāni satta ca bojjhaṅge ariyañca aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ sotāpattiphalañca sakadāgāmiphalañca anāgāmiphalañca arahattañca samāpajjiṁ …pe… ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.10": "doso ca me catto … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.11": "moho ca me catto vanto mutto pahīno paṭinissaṭṭho ukkheṭito samukkheṭito, rāgā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ dosā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ mohā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti vattukāmo paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.12": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa. ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.14": "mohā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ paṭhamañca jhānaṁ samāpajjinti vattukāmo dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjinti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.16": "Tīhākārehi …pe… sattahākārehi mohā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇaṁ paṭhamañca jhānaṁ dutiyañca jhānaṁ tatiyañca jhānaṁ catutthañca jhānaṁ …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.17": "rāgā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti vattukāmo dosā me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇanti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti pārājikassa; ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.19": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.21": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.22": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.23": "vinidhāya khantiṁ, ",

  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.26": "Vatthuvisārakassa sabbamūlakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.27": "Vatthuvisārakassa cakkapeyyālaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:5.4.28": "Vatthukāmavārakathā niṭṭhitā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.1": "Tīhākārehi yo te vihāre vasi so bhikkhu paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajji … ",
