  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.68": "vinidhāya ruciṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.69": "vinidhāya bhāvaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.70": "Tīhākārehi …pe… sattahākārehi yo te vihāre vasi so bhikkhu suññāgāre paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.71": "dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.72": "tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.73": "catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajji … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.74": "samāpajjati … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.75": "samāpanno … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.76": "so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhī … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.77": "vasī … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.78": "tena bhikkhunā suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikatanti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.79": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.80": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.81": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.82": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.83": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.84": "vinidhāya khantiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.85": "vinidhāya ruciṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.86": "vinidhāya bhāvaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.1.87.1": "Yathā idaṁ vitthāritaṁ evameva sesānipi vitthāretabbāni. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.1": "Tīhākārehi …pe… sattahākārehi yo te cīvaraṁ paribhuñji … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.2": "yo te piṇḍapātaṁ paribhuñji … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.3": "yo te senāsanaṁ paribhuñji … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.4": "yo te gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ paribhuñji so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajji … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.5": "samāpajjati … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.6": "samāpanno … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.7": "so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhī … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.8": "vasī … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.9": "tena bhikkhunā suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikatanti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.10": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.11": "vinidhāya bhāvaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.12": "Tīhākārehi …pe… sattahākārehi yena te vihāro paribhutto … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.13": "yena te cīvaraṁ paribhuttaṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.14": "yena te piṇḍapāto paribhutto … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.15": "yena te senāsanaṁ paribhuttaṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.16": "yena te gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro paribhutto … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.17": "so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajji … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.18": "samāpajjati … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.19": "samāpanno … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.20": "so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhī … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.21": "vasī … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.22": "tena bhikkhunā suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikatanti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.23": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.24": "vinidhāya bhāvaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.25": "Tīhākārehi …pe… sattahākārehi yaṁ tvaṁ āgamma vihāraṁ adāsi … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.26": "cīvaraṁ adāsi … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.27": "piṇḍapātaṁ adāsi … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.28": "senāsanaṁ adāsi … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.29": "gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ adāsi so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajji … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.30": "samāpajjati … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.31": "samāpanno … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.32": "so bhikkhu suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhī … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.33": "vasī … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.34": "tena bhikkhunā suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikatanti sampajānamusā bhaṇantassa paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.35": "na paṭivijānantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.36": "pubbevassa hoti musā bhaṇissanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.37": "bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmīti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.38": "bhaṇitassa hoti musā mayā bhaṇitanti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.39": "vinidhāya diṭṭhiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.40": "vinidhāya khantiṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.41": "vinidhāya ruciṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.42": "vinidhāya bhāvaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.43": "Peyyālapannarasakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.44": "Paccayappaṭisaṁyuttavārakathā niṭṭhitā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:6.2.45": "Uttarimanussadhammacakkapeyyālaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.1": "Anāpatti—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.2": "adhimānena, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.3": "anullapanādhippāyassa, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.4": "ummattakassa, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.5": "khittacittassa, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.6": "vedanāṭṭassa, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.7": "ādikammikassāti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.8": "4.1. Vinītavatthuuddānagāthā ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.9": "Adhimāne araññamhi, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.10": "piṇḍopajjhāriyāpatho; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.11": "Saṁyojanā rahodhammā, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.12": "vihāro paccupaṭṭhito. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.13": "Na dukkaraṁ viriyamathopi maccuno, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.14": "Bhāyāvuso vippaṭisāri sammā; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.15": "Viriyena yogena ārādhanāya, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.16": "Atha vedanāya adhivāsanā duve. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.17": "Brāhmaṇe pañca vatthūni, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.18": "aññaṁ byākaraṇā tayo; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.19": "Agārāvaraṇā kāmā, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.20": "rati cāpi apakkami. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.21": "Aṭṭhi pesi ubho gāvaghātakā, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.22": "Piṇḍo sākuṇiko nicchavi orabbhi; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.23": "Asi ca sūkariko satti māgavi, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.24": "Usu ca kāraṇiko sūci sārathi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.25": "Yo ca sibbīyati sūcako hi so, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.26": "Aṇḍabhāri ahu gāmakūṭako; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.27": "Kūpe nimuggo hi so pāradāriko, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.28": "Gūthakhādī ahu duṭṭhabrāhmaṇo. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.29": "Nicchavitthī aticārinī ahu, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.30": "Maṅgulitthī ahu ikkhaṇitthikā; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.31": "Okilinī hi sapattaṅgārokiri, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.32": "Sīsacchinno ahu coraghātako. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.33": "Bhikkhu bhikkhunī sikkhamānā, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.34": "Sāmaṇero atha sāmaṇerikā; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.35": "Kassapassa vinayasmiṁ pabbajaṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.36": "Pāpakammamakariṁsu tāvade. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.37": "Tapodā rājagahe yuddhaṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.38": "nāgānogāhanena ca; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.39": "Sobhito arahaṁ bhikkhu, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:7.40": "pañcakappasataṁ sareti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.1.0": "4.2. Vinītavatthu ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.1.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu adhimānena aññaṁ byākāsi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.1.2": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.1.3": "“bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.1.4": "Kacci nu kho ahaṁ pārājikaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.1.5": "Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.1.6": "“Anāpatti, bhikkhu, adhimānenā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu paṇidhāya araññe viharati—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.2": "“evaṁ maṁ jano sambhāvessatī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.3": "Taṁ jano sambhāvesi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.4": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.5": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, pārājikassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.6": "Na ca, bhikkhave, paṇidhāya araññe vatthabbaṁ. Yo vaseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.7": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu paṇidhāya piṇḍāya carati—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.8": "“evaṁ maṁ jano sambhāvessatī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.9": "Taṁ jano sambhāvesi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.10": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.11": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, pārājikassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.2.12": "Na ca, bhikkhave, paṇidhāya piṇḍāya caritabbaṁ. Yo careyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.2": "“ye, āvuso, amhākaṁ upajjhāyassa saddhivihārikā sabbeva arahanto”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.3": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.4": "“kiṁcitto tvaṁ, bhikkhū”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.5": "“Ullapanādhippāyo ahaṁ, bhagavā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.6": "“Anāpatti, bhikkhu, pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.7": "āpatti thullaccayassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.8": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.9": "“ye, āvuso, amhākaṁ upajjhāyassa antevāsikā sabbeva mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.10": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.11": "“kiṁcitto tvaṁ, bhikkhū”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.12": "“Ullapanādhippāyo ahaṁ, bhagavā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.13": "“Anāpatti, bhikkhu, pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.3.14": "āpatti thullaccayassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.4.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu paṇidhāya caṅkamati … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.4.2": "paṇidhāya tiṭṭhati … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.4.3": "paṇidhāya nisīdati … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.4.4": "paṇidhāya seyyaṁ kappeti—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.4.5": "“evaṁ maṁ jano sambhāvessatī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.4.6": "Taṁ jano sambhāvesi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.4.7": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.4.8": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, pārājikassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.4.9": "Na ca, bhikkhave, paṇidhāya seyyā kappetabbā. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.4.10": "Yo kappeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.5.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu aññatarassa bhikkhuno uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.5.2": "Sopi evamāha—“mayhampi, āvuso, saṁyojanā pahīnā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.5.3": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.5.4": "“āpattiṁ tvaṁ, bhikkhu, āpanno pārājikan”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu rahogato uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.2": "Paracittavidū bhikkhu taṁ bhikkhuṁ apasādesi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.3": "“mā, āvuso, evarūpaṁ abhaṇi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.4": "Nattheso tuyhan”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.5": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.6": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.7": "āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.8": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu rahogato uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.9": "Devatā taṁ bhikkhuṁ apasādesi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.10": "“mā, bhante, evarūpaṁ abhaṇi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.11": "Nattheso tuyhan”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.12": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.13": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.6.14": "āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu aññataraṁ upāsakaṁ etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.2": "“yo, āvuso, tuyhaṁ vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.3": "So ca tassa vihāre vasati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.4": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.5": "“kiṁcitto tvaṁ, bhikkhū”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.6": "“Ullapanādhippāyo ahaṁ, bhagavā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.7": "“Anāpatti, bhikkhu, pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.8": "āpatti thullaccayassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.9": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu aññataraṁ upāsakaṁ etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.10": "“yaṁ tvaṁ, āvuso, upaṭṭhesi cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena so bhikkhu arahā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.11": "So ca taṁ upaṭṭheti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.12": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.13": "“kiṁcitto tvaṁ, bhikkhū”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.14": "“Ullapanādhippāyo ahaṁ, bhagavā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.15": "“Anāpatti, bhikkhu, pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.7.16": "āpatti thullaccayassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.2": "Taṁ bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.3": "“atthāyasmato uttarimanussadhammo”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.4": "“Nāvuso, dukkaraṁ aññaṁ byākātun”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.5": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.6": "“ye kho te bhagavato sāvakā te evaṁ vadeyyuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.7": "Ahañcamhi na bhagavato sāvako. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.8": "Kacci nu kho ahaṁ pārājikaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.9": "Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.10": "“Kiṁcitto tvaṁ, bhikkhū”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.11": "“Anullapanādhippāyo ahaṁ, bhagavā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.8.12": "“Anāpatti, bhikkhu, anullapanādhippāyassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.2": "Taṁ bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.3": "“atthāyasmato uttarimanussadhammo”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.4": "“Ārādhanīyo kho, āvuso, dhammo āraddhavīriyenā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.5": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.6": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, anullapanādhippāyassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.7": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.8": "Taṁ bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.9": "“mā kho, āvuso, bhāyī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.10": "“Nāhaṁ, āvuso, maccuno bhāyāmī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.11": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.12": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, anullapanādhippāyassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.13": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.14": "Taṁ bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.15": "“mā kho, āvuso, bhāyī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.16": "“Yo nūnāvuso, vippaṭisārī assa so bhāyeyyā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.17": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.18": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, anullapanādhippāyassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.19": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.20": "Taṁ bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.21": "“atthāyasmato uttarimanussadhammo”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.22": "“Ārādhanīyo kho, āvuso, dhammo sammāpayuttenā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.23": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.24": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, anullapanādhippāyassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.25": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.26": "Taṁ bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.27": "“atthāyasmato uttarimanussadhammo”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.28": "“Ārādhanīyo kho, āvuso, dhammo āraddhavīriyenā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.29": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.30": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, anullapanādhippāyassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.31": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.32": "Taṁ bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.33": "“atthāyasmato uttarimanussadhammo”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.34": "“Ārādhanīyo kho, āvuso, dhammo yuttayogenā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.35": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.9.36": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, anullapanādhippāyassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.2": "Taṁ bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.3": "“kaccāvuso, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyan”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.4": "“Nāvuso, sakkā yena vā tena vā adhivāsetun”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.5": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.6": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, anullapanādhippāyassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.7": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.8": "Taṁ bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.9": "“kaccāvuso, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyan”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.10": "“Nāvuso, sakkā puthujjanena adhivāsetun”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.11": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.12": "“kiṁcitto tvaṁ, bhikkhū”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.13": "“Ullapanādhippāyo ahaṁ, bhagavā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.14": "“Anāpatti, bhikkhu, pārājikassa; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.10.15": "āpatti thullaccayassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro brāhmaṇo bhikkhū nimantetvā etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.2": "“āyantu bhonto arahanto”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.3": "Tesaṁ kukkuccaṁ ahosi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.4": "“mayañcamha na arahanto. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.5": "Ayañca brāhmaṇo amhe arahantavādena samudācarati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.6": "Kathaṁ nu kho amhehi paṭipajjitabban”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.7": "Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.8": "“Anāpatti, bhikkhave, pasādabhaññe”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.9": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro brāhmaṇo bhikkhū nimantetvā etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.10": "“nisīdantu bhonto arahanto”ti … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.11": "“bhuñjantu bhonto arahanto”ti … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.12": "“tappentu bhonto arahanto”ti … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.13": "“gacchantu, bhonto arahanto”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.14": "Tesaṁ kukkuccaṁ ahosi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.15": "“mayañcamha na arahanto. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.16": "Ayañca brāhmaṇo amhe arahantavādena samudācarati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.17": "Kathaṁ nu kho amhehi paṭipajjitabban”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.18": "Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.11.19": "“Anāpatti, bhikkhave, pasādabhaññe”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu aññatarassa bhikkhuno uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.2": "Sopi evamāha—“mayhampi, āvuso, āsavā pahīnā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.3": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.4": "“āpattiṁ tvaṁ, bhikkhu, āpanno pārājikan”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.5": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu aññatarassa bhikkhuno uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.6": "Sopi evamāha—“mayhampi, āvuso, ete dhammā saṁvijjantī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.7": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.8": "“āpattiṁ tvaṁ, bhikkhu, āpanno pārājikan”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.9": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu aññatarassa bhikkhuno uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.10": "Sopi evamāha—“ahampāvuso, tesu dhammesu sandissāmī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.11": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.12.12": "“āpattiṁ tvaṁ, bhikkhu, āpanno pārājikan”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.1": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ñātakā etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.2": "“ehi, bhante, agāraṁ ajjhāvasā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.3": "“Abhabbo kho, āvuso, mādiso agāraṁ ajjhāvasitun”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.4": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.5": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, anullapanādhippāyassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.6": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ñātakā etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.7": "“ehi, bhante, kāme paribhuñjā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.8": "“Āvaṭā me, āvuso, kāmā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.9": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.10": "“anāpatti, bhikkhu, anullapanādhippāyassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.11": "Tena kho pana samayena aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ñātakā etadavocuṁ—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.12": "“abhiramasi, bhante”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.13": "“Abhirato ahaṁ, āvuso, paramāya abhiratiyā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.14": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.15": "“Ye kho te bhagavato sāvakā te evaṁ vadeyyuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.16": "Ahañcamhi na bhagavato sāvako. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.17": "Kacci nu kho ahaṁ pārājikaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.18": "Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.19": "“Kiṁcitto tvaṁ, bhikkhū”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.20": "“Anullapanādhippāyo ahaṁ, bhagavā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.13.21": "“Anāpatti, bhikkhu, anullapanādhippāyassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.14.1": "Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū katikaṁ katvā aññatarasmiṁ āvāse vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.14.2": "“yo imamhā āvāsā paṭhamaṁ pakkamissati taṁ mayaṁ arahāti jānissāmā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.14.3": "Aññataro bhikkhu—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.14.4": "“maṁ arahāti jānantū”ti, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.14.5": "tamhā āvāsā paṭhamaṁ pakkāmi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.14.6": "Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:8.14.7": "“āpattiṁ tvaṁ, bhikkhu, āpanno pārājikan”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.1.1": "Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.1.2": "Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca lakkhaṇo āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.1.3": "Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaraṁ ādāya yenāyasmā lakkhaṇo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.1.4": "“āyāmāvuso lakkhaṇa, rājagahaṁ piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.1.5": "“Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.1.6": "Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṁ padese sitaṁ pātvākāsi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.1.7": "Atha kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.1.8": "“ko nu kho, āvuso moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.1.9": "“Akālo kho, āvuso lakkhaṇa, etassa pañhassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.1.10": "Bhagavato maṁ santike etaṁ pañhaṁ pucchā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.1": "Atha kho āyasmā ca lakkhaṇo āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.2": "upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.3": "Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā lakkhaṇo āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.4": "“idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṁ padese sitaṁ pātvākāsi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.5": "Ko nu kho, āvuso moggallāna, hetu ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.6": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.7": "Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā phāsuḷantarikāhi vituḍenti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.8": "Sā sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.9": "Tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, etadahosi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.10": "‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, evarūpopi nāma satto bhavissati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.11": "Evarūpopi nāma yakkho bhavissati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.12": "Evarūpopi nāma attabhāvappaṭilābho bhavissatī’”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.13": "Bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.14": "“uttarimanussadhammaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno ullapatī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.15": "Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.16": "“cakkhubhūtā vata, bhikkhave, sāvakā viharanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.17": "Ñāṇabhūtā vata, bhikkhave, sāvakā viharanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.18": "Yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṁ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṁ vā karissati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.19": "Pubbeva me so, bhikkhave, satto diṭṭho ahosi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.20": "Api cāhaṁ na byākāsiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.21": "Ahañcetaṁ byākareyyaṁ pare ca me na saddaheyyuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.22": "Ye me na saddaheyyuṁ tesaṁ taṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.23": "Eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe goghātako ahosi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.24": "So tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena evarūpaṁ attabhāvappaṭilābhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.25": "Saccaṁ, bhikkhave, moggallāno āha. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.2.26": "Anāpatti, bhikkhave, moggallānassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.1": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ maṁsapesiṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.2": "Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti vibhajjenti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.3": "Sā sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.4": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe goghātako ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.5": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ maṁsapiṇḍaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.6": "Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti vibhajjenti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.7": "So sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.8": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sākuṇiko ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.9": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ nicchaviṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.10": "Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti vibhajjenti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.11": "So sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.12": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe orabbhiko ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.13": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ asilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.14": "Tassa te asī uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.15": "So sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.16": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūkariko ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.17": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ sattilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.18": "Tassa tā sattiyo uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.19": "So sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.20": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe māgaviko ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.21": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ usulomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.22": "Tassa te usū uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.23": "So sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.24": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe kāraṇiko ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.25": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ sūcilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.26": "Tassa tā sūciyo uppatitvā uppatitvā tasseva kāye nipatanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.27": "So sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.28": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sārathiko ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.29": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ sūcilomaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.30": "Tassa tā sūciyo sīse pavisitvā mukhato nikkhamanti; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.31": "mukhe pavisitvā urato nikkhamanti; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.32": "ure pavisitvā udarato nikkhamanti; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.33": "udare pavisitvā ūrūhi nikkhamanti; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.34": "ūrūsu pavisitvā jaṅghāhi nikkhamanti; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.35": "jaṅghāsu pavisitvā pādehi nikkhamanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.36": "So sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.37": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe sūcako ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.38": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ kumbhaṇḍaṁ purisaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.39": "So gacchantopi teva aṇḍe khandhe āropetvā gacchati, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.40": "nisīdantopi tesveva aṇḍesu nisīdati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.41": "Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti vibhajjenti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.42": "So sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.43": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe gāmakūṭo ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.44": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ purisaṁ gūthakūpe sasīsakaṁ nimuggaṁ …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.45": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe pāradāriko ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.46": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ purisaṁ gūthakūpe sasīsakaṁ nimuggaṁ ubhohi hatthehi gūthaṁ khādantaṁ …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.47": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe duṭṭhabrāhmaṇo ahosi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.48": "So kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane bhikkhusaṅghaṁ bhattena nimantetvā doṇiyo gūthassa pūrāpetvā kālaṁ ārocāpetvā etadavoca—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.49": "‘ato, bhonto, yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjantu ceva harantu cā’”ti …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.50": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ nicchaviṁ itthiṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.51": "Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti vibhajjenti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.52": "Sā sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.53": "esā, bhikkhave, itthī imasmiṁyeva rājagahe aticārinī ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.54": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ itthiṁ duggandhaṁ maṅguliṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.55": "Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti vibhajjenti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.56": "Sā sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.57": "esā, bhikkhave, itthī imasmiṁyeva rājagahe ikkhaṇikā ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.58": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ itthiṁ uppakkaṁ okiliniṁ okiriniṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.59": "Sā sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.60": "esā, bhikkhave, itthī kāliṅgassa rañño aggamahesī ahosi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.61": "Sā issāpakatā sapattiṁ aṅgārakaṭāhena okiri …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.62": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ asīsakaṁ kabandhaṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.63": "Tassa ure akkhīni ceva honti mukhañca. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.64": "Tamenaṁ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti vibhajjenti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.65": "So sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.66": "eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṁyeva rājagahe hāriko nāma coraghātako ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.67": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ bhikkhuṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.68": "Tassa saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā, pattopi āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto, kāyabandhanampi ādittaṁ sampajjalitaṁ sajotibhūtaṁ, kāyopi āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.69": "So sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti …pe… ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.70": "eso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhu ahosi …pe…. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.71": "“Idhāhaṁ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṁ bhikkhuniṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.72": "addasaṁ sikkhamānaṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.73": "addasaṁ sāmaṇeraṁ … ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.74": "addasaṁ sāmaṇeriṁ vehāsaṁ gacchantiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.75": "Tassā saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā, pattopi āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto, kāyabandhanampi ādittaṁ sampajjalitaṁ sajotibhūtaṁ, kāyopi āditto sampajjalito sajotibhūto. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.76": "Sā sudaṁ aṭṭassaraṁ karoti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.77": "Tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, etadahosi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.78": "‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho, evarūpopi nāma satto bhavissati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.79": "Evarūpopi nāma yakkho bhavissati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.80": "Evarūpopi nāma attabhāvappaṭilābho bhavissatī’”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.81": "Bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.82": "“uttarimanussadhammaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno ullapatī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.83": "Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.84": "“cakkhubhūtā vata, bhikkhave, sāvakā viharanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.85": "Ñāṇabhūtā vata, bhikkhave, sāvakā viharanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.86": "Yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṁ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṁ vā karissati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.87": "Pubbeva me sā, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerī diṭṭhā ahosi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.88": "Api cāhaṁ na byākāsiṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.89": "Ahañcetaṁ byākareyyaṁ pare ca me na saddaheyyuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.90": "Ye me na saddaheyyuṁ tesaṁ taṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.91": "Esā, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇerī ahosi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.92": "Sā tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena evarūpaṁ attabhāvappaṭilābhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.93": "Saccaṁ, bhikkhave, moggallāno āha. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.3.94": "Anāpatti, bhikkhave, moggallānassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.1": "Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.2": "“yatāyaṁ, āvuso, tapodā sandati so daho acchodako sītodako sātodako setako suppatittho ramaṇīyo pahūtamacchakacchapo cakkamattāni ca padumāni pupphantī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.3": "Bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.4": "“kathañhi nāma āyasmā mahāmoggallāno evaṁ vakkhati—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.5": "‘yatāyaṁ, āvuso, tapodā sandati so daho acchodako sītodako sātodako setako suppatittho ramaṇīyo pahūtamacchakacchapo cakkamattāni ca padumāni pupphantī’ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.6": "Atha ca panāyaṁ tapodā kuthitā sandati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.7": "Uttarimanussadhammaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno ullapatī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.8": "Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.9": "“Yatāyaṁ, bhikkhave, tapodā sandati so daho acchodako sītodako sātodako setako suppatittho ramaṇīyo pahūtamacchakacchapo cakkamattāni ca padumāni pupphanti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.10": "Api cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, tapodā dvinnaṁ mahānirayānaṁ antarikāya āgacchati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.11": "Tenāyaṁ tapodā kuthitā sandati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.12": "Saccaṁ, bhikkhave, moggallāno āha. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.4.13": "Anāpatti, bhikkhave, moggallānassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.1": "Tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro licchavīhi saddhiṁ saṅgāmento pabhaggo ahosi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.2": "Atha rājā pacchā senaṁ saṅkaḍḍhitvā licchavayo parājesi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.3": "Saṅgāme ca nandī carati—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.4": "“raññā licchavī pabhaggā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.5": "Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.6": "“rājā, āvuso, licchavīhi pabhaggo”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.7": "Bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.8": "“kathañhi nāma āyasmā mahāmoggallāno evaṁ vakkhati—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.9": "‘rājā, āvuso, licchavīhi pabhaggo’ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.10": "Saṅgāme ca nandī carati—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.11": "‘raññā licchavī pabhaggā’ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.12": "Uttarimanussadhammaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno ullapatī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.13": "Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.14": "“Paṭhamaṁ, bhikkhave, rājā licchavīhi pabhaggo. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.15": "Atha rājā pacchā senaṁ saṅkaḍḍhitvā licchavayo parājesi. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.16": "Saccaṁ, bhikkhave, moggallāno āha. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.5.17": "Anāpatti, bhikkhave, moggallānassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.6.1": "Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.6.2": "“idhāhaṁ, āvuso, sappinikāya nadiyā tīre āneñjaṁ samādhiṁ samāpanno nāgānaṁ ogayha uttarantānaṁ koñcaṁ karontānaṁ saddaṁ assosin”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.6.3": "Bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.6.4": "“kathañhi nāma āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āneñjaṁ samādhiṁ samāpanno saddaṁ sossati. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.6.5": "Uttarimanussadhammaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno ullapatī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.6.6": "Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.6.7": "“Attheso, bhikkhave, samādhi so ca kho aparisuddho. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.6.8": "Saccaṁ, bhikkhave, moggallāno āha. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.6.9": "Anāpatti, bhikkhave, moggallānassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.1": "Atha kho āyasmā sobhito bhikkhū āmantesi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.2": "“ahaṁ, āvuso, pañca kappasatāni anussarāmī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.3": "Bhikkhū ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.4": "“kathañhi nāma āyasmā sobhito evaṁ vakkhati—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.5": "‘ahaṁ, āvuso, pañca kappasatāni anussarāmī’ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.6": "Uttarimanussadhammaṁ āyasmā sobhito ullapatī”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.7": "Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.8": "“Atthesā, bhikkhave, sobhitassa. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.9": "Sā ca kho ekāyeva jāti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.10": "Saccaṁ, bhikkhave, sobhito āha. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.11": "Anāpatti, bhikkhave, sobhitassā”ti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.12": "Catutthapārājikaṁ samattaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.13": "Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.14": "yesaṁ bhikkhu aññataraṁ vā aññataraṁ vā āpajjitvā na labhati bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ saṁvāsaṁ, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.15": "yathā pure tathā pacchā, pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.16": "Tatthāyasmante pucchāmi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.17": "“kaccittha parisuddhā”? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.18": "Dutiyampi pucchāmi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.19": "“kaccittha parisuddhā”? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.20": "Tatiyampi pucchāmi—",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.21": "“kaccittha parisuddhā”? ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.22": "Parisuddhetthāyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.23": "evametaṁ dhārayāmīti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.24": "Pārājikaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.25": "Tassuddānaṁ ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.26": "Methunādinnādānañca, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.27": "manussaviggahuttari; ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.28": "Pārājikāni cattāri, ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.29": "chejjavatthū asaṁsayāti. ",
  "pli-tv-bu-vb-pj4:9.7.30": "Pārājikakaṇḍaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ. "
}
